segments.text: Hi . This is a Receptionist Desk . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I just checked in , but I need to change my room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I reserved a non-smoking room , but the smell of smoke in this room is so strong that I can ’ t endure it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . I ’ ll arrange a non-smoking room for you right away . The doorman is going to help you with your luggage . I do apologize for the inconvenience .
segments.speaker: S1
